column4: i have 6.10 and applied all the updates, now i have 2 kernel versions, 2.6.17-10 and 2.6.17-11.  should i use -11 to upgrade to ubuntu 7.04?
i dont think it will matter what you're actually running as long as both are installed.
i did a fresh install of 6.10, and have to update 165 packages, took like 30 to 40 minutes
